1.content: in the dead of night a figure approaches the lone museum seemingly out of the way of any other civilization. the figure approaches as a light reveals them to be....
1.title: The beginning of the fun

choices: The Ideas of the Future exhibit
The Land of the Norse Gods
head downstairs to the first floor
11.content: A hidden museum full of treasures, the owner is nowhere in sight, it's like christmas for a thief like Sly. sure he mainly robs the big time criminals and thugs but he can have the occasional lapse into just classic thievery when the score is one like this. He easily climbs up to the roof top and over to a sky light. "all right. it's go time guys." as he easily cuts through the glass and drops onto the second floor he looks around "now which room to hit first"
11.title: The Thevius Raccoonus

choices: A window leading into a room with what looks like jewelry
A window leading into an exhibit of mummies
A window leading into a room full of modern wonders
A room of what looks like voodoo paraphenalia
12.content: Having gotten intel that Sly Cooper was about to rob this out of the way museum and so attempted to set up a bust. Unfortunately no one seemed to know who owned the museum or even who sent in the intelligence. As such Carmelita had to improvise as she arrived and found a few windows that looked accessible. Since time was of the essence however whichever she chose she'd have to stick with.
12.title: the fox chases the raccoon

121.content:
“Might as as well start somewhere.” She said to herself as she jumped to a window close enough to her position and climbed inside.

Upon reaching the interior, Carmelita shined a flashlight into the room, revealing display after display of what appeared to be a bunch of gemstones and accessories. “Hmm, this seems like a pretty likely place that thief would strike.” As Carmelita explored the exhibit, she stopped standing in front of a row that strangely hadn’t had its case fully closed. Maybe Sly had already arrived but hightailed it in the middle of the job? Or perhaps whoever ran the place was being too careless. Regardless Carmelita couldn’t have anything happen to any of the artifacts in the museum.

“Hmm. Perhaps I can throw Cooper for a loop and keep that with me. Then when he’s distracted I can sneak up and bag him. Heh heh. That’ll show him...” Walking up to the display, Carmelita looked down to see the artifact(s) sitting on a soft pillow.
121.title: Ancient Jewels and Accessories Exhibit

choices: The light reflects off the ruby, preventing her from looking away
she puts it on, unwittingly activating the curse
1212.content: Carmelita grabs the necklace, holding it up "this looks easy enough to hold onto." Carmelita looks it over to make sure it isn't damaged in any way when.
1212.title: A Ruby Necklace

12122.content:
“Hmm. No signs of damages or previous fingerprints. That means Cooper isn’t here yet. In that case I better find a good place to keep this.” Just as she was about to pocket the necklace, the fox remembered something: Sly was always good at picking someone’s pockets. So if she placed the necklace there, then chances are that Sly could easily do the same with her.

“...Hmph! Nice try Cooper. But I’m going to let you get the upper hand this time.” Thinking again, Carmelita rubbed a hand to her neck before finally coming up with an idea. “Let’s see you try to snatch it from off my neck raccoon...” Not even hesitating, Carmelita slid the necklace over her head and smirked as it hung off her neck. “Heh heh. Perfect... Now to wait for Sly...”

The fox then walked away from the display case, however as she made her way down the hall, the gem in the necklace faintly began to glow. With each step Carmelita began to feel a bit strange as the glow soon dimmed down. “Hnngh... weird... why do I suddenly feel so... odd?” She asked herself as she began to feel a strange tingling sensation...
12122.title: she puts it on, unwittingly activating the curse

121221.content: Carmelita grips her head as the tingling gets worse and focuses on her head "what's....happening to my head....i'm getting....such a migraine" as she stops walking she finally notices the glow of the necklace, though not before the curse takes root, causing her head to
121221.title: ...in her head.

choices: A set of three gold bracelets.
1213.content: What else could it be?
1213.title: Something else.

choices: The bracelet with the red gem
The bracelet with the blue gem
The bracelet with the green gem
12132.content: Carmelita looks at the bracelets, one red with a simple etching of an hourglass, one blue with a simple etching of a large figured person, and one with a green gem with a...balloon etching? "hm. a set of 3 huh? well the best thing is to carry all 3 but i don't have enough space.....but if cooper is here he won't leave with just part of the set so one may be all i need. odd marks by the gems though. but what could happen. they're on public displa" she reaches out and puts on....
12132.title: A set of three gold bracelets.

choices: The effects of the bracelet get worse
The broken urns have their own curse
121321.content: The bracelet snaps closed around carmelita's arm with a satisfying CLINK sound. "Perfect. Lets see cooper swipe this from me now" she sneaks down the hall, her shock pistol at the ready, though her keen senses fail to notice the faint glow from the bracelet, or her hips, rear, and breasts beginning to grow. That is until her newly widened gait knocks over a stand of ancient golden urns "gah! How did that- WHAT HAPPENED TO ME!?" Carmelita stumbles a bit as she finally notices her newly thickened figure, her breasts as big as her head and her rear and hips perfectly match. "How did this happen?! Go back!" As if the universe responded to carmelita's demand....
121321.title: The bracelet with the red gem

choices: Someone sneaks up to take the band for themselves
Carm decides to keep testing this power
1213211.content:
The bracelet gem glows as time begins rewinding around carmelita, her body ending up right back at the stand with all the bracelets when it stops, her hips back to normal, though her upper body is now even bigger

"What the devil? I...rewound time? But why is my top even....like sand in an hourglass of course!!" As she ponders over this new potential ability however...
1213211.title: Time seems to rewind,

12132112.content:
Just before Carmelita could figure out how the bracelet’s power worked, she suddenly heard something approaching her. “Who’s there?!”

Luckily, though embarrassingly, as the fox turned around, the figure that had been sneaking up behind her was knocked to the ground thanks to her newly grown chest. “Ugh... of all ways to knock someone back...”

“Ugh, what just hit me?...” the sound of the figure’s voice was all too familiar for her, and as Carmelita looked over her overblown bosom, she managed to get a good look at who her mystery criminal was.
12132112.title: Someone sneaks up to take the band for themselves

choices: She tests it by going further back in time.
She tests it by going forward in time.
12132113.content:
The idea of being able to turn back time was enough fo make Carmelita ponder the potential that the ability could have. If she could figure out how the ability worked then it could prove to be quite useful for capturing crooks, and maybe even Sly.

“Hmm... well, I suppose it wouldn’t hurt to try and figure out how this works... though where to begin?”
12132113.title: Carm decides to keep testing this power

choices: ...her body rapidly began to gain more weight.
...her body slowly began to gain more weight.
121322.content:
Snapping the blue gem bracelet onto her arm, Carmelita quickly made her way down the exhibit, hoping Sly would soon make his appearance. “Hopefully this plan will work....” She said to herself. Looking at the bracelet she couldn’t help but admire just how well it complemented her jacket. “Hmm. Pity that have to return this. It does look pretty nice on me.” As she placed her arm down, she turned her attention to a hiding spot nearby. However, as she did, the sapphire in the bracelet began to glow, sending a strange tingling feeling across Carmelita’s body.

“Hmm?” She looked around, feeling the sensation hit her. “Weird, what was that feeling that I... I... ugh...” As she came to a slow stop, the bracelet’s glow dimmed down, while the inspector took the chance to catch her breath. “Strange... normally I... never tire out this quickly...”

As she panted and breathed...
121322.title: Tons of Fun

choices: upward, easily tipping her over with her new top heavy shape
downward, possibly letting her waddle to a safe hiding spot
1213221.content: in a matter of moments Inspector Fox's stomach began to balloon out in weight, her balance being thrown off "what the?! what's happening to m-" as she recalls the image of the bracelet's etching "there's no way!" as if in response her growing gut gets another growth spurt, now looking less like she just ate a massive meal and more like a massive pot belly "i need to get this off before things get worse" and with that classic tempting fate phrase the growth spreads...
1213221.title: ...her body rapidly began to gain more weight.

choices: A Large Silver Booth with a computer inside it.
A Small room with a high tech TV and a small remote.
123.content:
Hopping into the first window she spotted, Carmelita climbed through and landed safely inside one of the exhibits. "Alright, no sign of Cooper yet." she said, pulling out a flashlight. "Now I just need to wait it out and bust him when I get the chance..."

As she searched around the exhibit, her light shined upon rows and rooms filled with several pieces of technology. Most of which was nothing like anything she was familiar with. It wasn't until she came across a sign that she was able to assess where she was.

"The Modern Wonders of Technology"... "Strange, I could've sworn that a museum like this would display and show off more historical pieces of technology from times past. This stuff though? Seriously, It looks like someone plucked all this out of a science fiction movie... This is supposed to be "modern"?

Making her way down the hall, Carmelita shined her light on several impressive looking gadgets both big and small. Busting Sly was her main priority, but she couldn't help but have her curiosity peaked just a little at just how these impressive feats of technology operated.

She then noticed that some of the displays had smaller signs by them that simply read "Try Me". With no sign of Sly yet, Carmelita shrugged and walked towards the first display she came across...
123.title: The Modern Wonders of Technology

choices: A Big Book of Spells and Black Magic
124.content:
Hopping through a window, Carmelita found herself inside a large room that contained rows upon rows of strange yet old looking objects. A closer inspection would reveal things such as odd ingredients, small beakers and a few needles and masks here or there.

“What kind of exhibit is this?” It wouldn’t be until a few steps in where Inspector Fox would soon discover just what exhibit this was. For at the edge of the room lied a small pedestal holding an object for public display. Said object appeared to be....
124.title: You Do Voodoo

choices: Mz. Ruby, looking for revenge for her arrest
Neyla, back from the grave and ready for revenge
1242.content: Carmelita steps up to the blank doll and picks it up, looking it over "a voodoo doll? hmph. as if these ever really worked" as she bounces the doll to make it dance she winces and drops it, something having cut her finger on the doll "ow! the dang thing must still have some needle or the like....what the?!" as she watches the doll begins to glow before changing into a doll of herself "it...it changed?!" as she goes to pick it back up a hand reaches out from the shadows, grabbing the doll and freezing carm up as if a giant hand has grabbed her "who's there?! i'm warning you!" the figure walks out to reveal....
1242.title: A Voodoo Doll

choices: the wonders of voodoo and haiti
13.content: Penelope climbs into the museum from a vanished window before pressing a button on their watch and the window reappears, Miss Mouse taking stock of the paths open "ok. that note said that if i want to make it up to those guys i'll need whatever i can find in here. too bad it was hardly specific....still if it's a chance to make it up to the gang i'll take it" the mouse finds the path to the main lobby and follows "now. which way to go"
13.title: The mouse returns

131.content:
“Hmm... better to just start simple so Let’s see...” As Penelope looked around, she soon saw a sign in front of a hallway. “Hmm. “The Idols of the Aztec Gods”. Sounds like a promising start to me...” The mouse soon walked into the exhibit and to her surprise she found quite the interesting display. Paintings of Aztec imagery, and woven tapestries filled the walls, and among the artifacts were several Idols decorating the room. “How interesting, but what could I possibly grab from...from...”

Penelope’s words were soon silenced as she soon came across three large idols near the end of the exhibit. The First idol bore a blank stare and expression, with its eyes being represented a ocean blue sapphires.

The second idol possessed bright green emerald eyes, and a cheerful and happy expression on its carved face.

The last idol bore a mean, and angered expression, with fiery red rubies acting as its eyes.

“Wow... these guys look like they could fetch a pretty penny..” With a small smile of confidence Penelope quickly ran over to the group of ancient idols, stopping in her tracks as she soon faced...
131.title: the aztec idol exhibit

1312.content:
Penelope came to a stop as she soon faced the smiling idol. Noting the emeralds for eyes, she quickly began to devise a plan to sneak the idol out of the exhibit.

“Hmm. Perhaps I can shrink it down and carry it in my pocket. Could make the job easier. Or I could just take the emeralds and leave. Not like they’ll notice.” She said as she stared at them “After all they do look pretty.... so...very... pretty....”

As Penelope continued to stare, she suddenly couldn’t take her eyes off of them. Something about staring into those beautiful green emeralds just made her feel so... happy. And joyful... so much so that a large smile began to stretch across her face.

“Heh heh... What’s going on?” She asked. “Why do I feel so... so happy~?” She giggled a bit, her own eyes slowly starting to glow a bright green color as well. Before she could question where this feeling came from, another strange feeling began to occur. As she rubbed her head, and placed a hand to her stomach she suddenly began to feel a lot more...
1312.title: A Good and Happy Feeling

134.content:
“The Wonders of Haiti” Huh I think I know this place off of memory. Home to Cajun culture and voodoo magic. Sounds interesting to me.”

Penelope smiled as she wandered on through, marveling at the decorations and exhibits on display. “Hmm... Now what could I nab here? It has to be something that’ll really prove that I’ve changed for the better.” The young mouse searched the rows until she eventually came across a display containing...
134.title: the wonders of voodoo and haiti

135.content: Walking pass the main lobby, Penelope soon glanced over at another set of rooms, leading to more exhibits...
135.title: more choices

1353.content: Further down, Penelope could see a few more exhibits...
1353.title: Another Exhibit?

choices: The Wonders of Voodoo and Haiti
The Aboriginal Legends of Dark Earth
14.content:
Years ago, Neyla stole the reconstructed body of Clockwerk for her own selfish purposes. Despite her attempt at taking over the world, she met her untimely demise at the hands of The Cooper Gang and her former partner, Inspector Carmelita Fox.

But recently things had taken an unexpected twist. As Neyla one day found herself awake on the ground; completely alive and breathing. The identity of Whoever brought her back was a mystery but that wasn’t what was on her mind. Now that she was back in the world of the living, only one thing floated around her head; revenge.

And Revenge was what she was going to find. For as she woke up, she found a note on her chest, possibly left by the person responsible for her reincarnation, leading her to this museum. With no hesitation Neyla climbed up to a window and jumped through without fail.

“Perfect. Now then, if this place is so important that I had to be told of its existence, then there HAS to be something here that can aid me with my revenge... but where to start?”
14.title: Neyla

info.brief_description: one of the various characters from sly cooper gets blown up, fattened or transformed
info.description: the chosen character enters a strange museum under the tip that either there are some rare priceless items owned by a not so reputable man or a tip off that a particular thief is about to break in, leading to various transformative scenarios. please keep pg 13, no violence
info.pretty_title: Sly Cooper in The Expansive Heist
